players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alone we are weak, but together we stand. Let's find the detective."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice instead of a more suspicious target like Bob? This seems odd."
Charlie: "Diana, I investigated Alice because she was the most suspicious to me. As the detective, I had to trust my gut. Now we know the truth."
You: "Let's work together to find the detective. We need to be careful with our words and actions from now on."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why reveal your investigation so early? This puts a target on your back and doesn't help us identify the mafia. Your timing seems suspicious."
